title: Dirty work: The fly-tippers turning trash into cash
description: Holding up a wad of cash, Cristian smiles as he counts out £50 notes while a friend beams and waves a finger at the camera.
content:

title: NHS pharmacies to pilot ‘sponge on a string’ test to spot cancer precursor
description: Scheme in England to identify signs of oesophageal cancer forms part of government’s 10-year health plan
content:
Hundreds of people in England are to be offered a “sponge on a string” test to identify a precursor to one of the deadliest cancers in high-street pharmacies for the first time.
Patients with persistent heartburn or acid reflux can take the “game-cha... [3967 chars]

title: Looser bonus rules and tax breaks needed to save London stock market, says CBI
description: Industry lobby group draws up 20-point plan to stop London ‘drifting into irrelevance’
content:
The London stock market risks “drifting into irrelevance” without government and regulatory reforms, ranging from tax breaks for stock market listings to looser bonus rules for directors, a lobbying group has said.
The 20 recommendation put forward b... [3520 chars]

title: Instagram wrongly says some users breached child sex abuse rules
description: It was "horrible", "stressful" and "isolating" those affected tell BBC News.
content:
The BBC has changed the names of the people in this piece to protect their identities.

title: IDF presence in Gaza 'only issue' still to be resolved in push for Israel-Hamas ceasefire, Sky News understands
description: The two sides have bridged significant differences on several other issues including the process of delivering humanitarian aid.
content:
A single but deeply divisive issue remains unresolved in the push to achieve a ceasefire in Gaza.
